title: New sparse API with linear_index
body_html:
This PR implements the new plan we discussed in #1471

It's based off of #1761 so you can ignore the first six commits.

The new methods:

  • linear_indices
  • sizeI
  • sizeV
  • dimI
  • dimV

I deleted the C implementation of sparse_mask but kept the Python version around for now. Also, there is an important bugfix for sparse dim (latest commit) which I can slice off into its own PR if we end up bikeshedding this more.

body:
This PR implements the new plan we discussed in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/1471

It's based off of #1761 so you can ignore the first six commits.

The new methods:

* linear_indices
* sizeI
* sizeV
* dimI
* dimV

I deleted the C implementation of sparse_mask but kept the Python version around for now. Also, there is an important bugfix for sparse dim (latest commit) which I can slice off into its own PR if we end up bikeshedding this more.
